info@futuretechliving.co.uk

122 Coates Way Watford Hertfordshire WD259PA

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner disable_element=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-facebook-square” color=”white”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-twitter” color=”white”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-instagram” color=”white”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fab fa-pinterest” color=”white”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”30″ content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1703753560413{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background: #292929 url(https://futuretechliving.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/vertical-grid-5.png?id=12972) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]Fill the form[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1538651720245{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”]

Let’s discuss your project

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1535104842056{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner el_class=”shadow-box form-dark”]

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]Questions?[vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1538651714454{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”]

    Read our F.A.Q.

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1538651007569{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

    How much does the consultation cost?

    The consultation is absolutely free. Simply schedule the time that is convenient for you and it’s all set.

    How long does it take to finish the interior?

    It depends on the project, but it’s usually from 2 to 4 months.

    What is included in the service?

    Free consultation, electricity and floor plans, interior design, 3D visualizations and construction management.

    Will I be charged for additional revisions?

    3 revision rounds are given initially, any additional changes have a simple fixed cost.

    Can I cancel my project?

    Yes, but the initial payment is reserved for this cause and is not refunded, as that cover the amount of work already done.
    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
